title: [In-memory-engine] tikv panic "[\"assertion failed: success\"] [backtrace=\"   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}\\n             at workspace/source/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/lib.rs:479:18" after run tpcc a long time
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
./tikv-server -V
 TiKV 
Release Version:   8.5.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   bc2c6521e3272e7c07384f48b79c5d0f3947fcea
Git Commit Branch: HEAD
UTC Build Time:    2024-11-06 06:47:40
Rust Version:      rustc 1.77.0-nightly (89e2160c4 2023-12-27)
Enable Features:   memory-engine pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine trace-async-tasks openssl-vendored
Profile:           dist_release
2024-11-06T18:50:11.665+0800

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8c/32g

### Steps to reproduce
1„ÄÅrun tpcc for 72h

### What did you expect?
no panic

### What did happened?
tikv panic
